documentation.text:
@dev Cancels a transaction by the seller.
 @param _transaction The transaction to be cancelled.

cancelTransaction(uint256).details: Cancels a transaction by the seller.

executeTransaction(uint256).details: Executes a transaction. Must have approved this contract to transfer the amount of currency specified to the seller. Transfers ownership of the item to the buyer.

params._transaction: The id of an existing trade

getTransaction(uint256).details: Returns the details for a transaction.

newTransaction(uint256,uint256).details: Opens a new transaction. Puts _item in escrow.

params._item: The id for the item to transaction.
params._price: The amount of currency for which to transact with the item.
